headline: Constellation Energy Completes Calpine Deal
summary: Constellation Energy has completed its acquisition of Calpine, creating a massive U.S. electricity producer at a time of rising demand, especially from the tech sector for new data centers.  Constellation is the largest producer of nuclear power in the U.S., while Calpine is one of the largest generators of electricity from natural gas and geothermal sources.  The combined companies have around 55 gigawatts of capacity.

headline: Constellation Sales Fall as Hispanic Pullback Continues
summary: Constellation reported lower third-quarter sales as beer sales lag amid weak consumer sentiment and a pullback in spending from Hispanic drinkers due to the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.
